message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and I sell it to you for $10,250?  That way we both get a fair deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer at $10,000, which is the maximum I can afford for this product. I hope this meets your expectations.
